record.name: Audio Conferencing
record.description: Use Event Audio Conferencing services when you require a call that offers, among other options, operator assistance, a formal introduction, and a variation of formats including Question & Answer or Lecture mode
record.detailedDescription: Use Event Audio Conferencing services when you require a call that offers, among other options, operator assistance, a formal introduction, and a variation of formats including Question & Answer or Lecture mode
